title: Erstwhile: Untold Tales From the Brothers Grimm
description: Fairy Tales have captured our hearts for generations, appealing to our taste for adventure, horror, and romance. Erstwhile gives the rarely told gems of Grimm's Tales the spotlight in these delightful comic adaptations.Included in this book:The Worn Out Dancing ShoesBrother and SisterDeath of the Little Red HenDoctor Know-It-AllSnow White and Rose RedIron HansThe Three Lazy Ones
author: Gina Biggs
